properties.value: A plank is a common Construction item and is used in several quests. Made from normal logs, it is the lowest-level type of plank. Each plank used while training Construction yields 29 experience.

This article is about the construction material. For other uses, see Plank (disambiguation).
 This article has a money making guide: Collecting planks.

A plank is a common Construction item and is used in several quests. Made from normal logs, it is the lowest-level type of plank. Each plank used while training Construction yields 29 experience.

Quests[edit | edit source]

  • Dragon Slayer I - 3 needed
  • In Search of the Myreque - 6 needed
  • Observatory Quest - 3 needed
  • Mountain Daughter - 1 needed
  • Royal Trouble - 1 needed, but can be obtained during quest
  • Underground Pass - 1 needed, but can be obtained during quest
  • The Great Brain Robbery - 18 needed
  • Horror from the Deep - 2 needed, but can be obtained during quest
  • In Aid of the Myreque - 11 needed
  • Darkness of Hallowvale - 2 needed
  • Daddy's Home - 10 needed, but can be obtained during quest

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Plank spawns in the Wilderness and elaborate or ornate lockboxes in the Camdozaal Vault the are the only source for free-to-play players prior to starting Dragon Slayer I.
  • There are no uses for planks in free-to-play except for the Dragon Slayer I quest.
